name: IED disarm
description:
Team Photo

Whats it about? Any Particular Challenge Category? 

A 3D battlefield Experience where you must survive against enemy AI that is placing explosive IEDs

Why is this beneficial to the Armed Forces?

Prepare for actual IED attacks, discovery, prevention. Instead of pretending there is a bomb in the ground.

Plans for the future

Improve machine learning

Team Credits

Daniel Fisher - Programming, Art, Design

Art Assets - Unity Asset Store, CGTrader

3D Media for sending me to the Jam.
